name: Avoid protected fields in final class (Flex)
description: This QR reports artifacts that have protected field in final classes.
output:
This QR reports artifacts that have protected field in final classes. It provides following information:

- Artifact full name
rationale: Protected fields are of no use in final class.
remediation: Make protected fields private in final class.

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Modularity and OO Encapsulation Conformity
